Name: Graham Dixon-Lewis
Notes: Combustion engineer and Fellow of the Royal Society

Name: Herbert George ( F )
Notes: University lecturer in chemistry , college librarian and bursar

Name: Frank Greenaway
Notes: Keeper of the Department of Chemistry at the Science Museum ( 1967-1980 ) ; Reader in the History of Science at the Davy-Faraday Research Laboratory of the Royal Institution ( 1970-1985 )

Name: William Lewis
Notes: Professor of Chemistry at University College , Exeter ( 1901-1935 )

Name: Derek Long
Notes: Emeritus Professor of Structural Chemistry at the University of Bradford , working in the field of Raman spectroscopy

Name: John Rose
Notes: Research chemist at Imperial Chemical Industries

Name: Walter H. Stockmayer ( HF )
Notes: American Rhodes Scholar , who was a chemist and pioneer of polymer science

Name: John Whiston
Notes: Associate Professor in chemistry at the Royal Military College of Science ( 1936-1956 )
